item.title: Home 31
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[rev_slider alias="niches_19_headfone" slidertitle="Niches 19 Headfone"][/rev_slider] WORLD-CLASS PERFORMANCE

Wireless headphone

With up to 40 hours of battery life, Beats Solo3 Wireless is your perfect everyday headphone. Get the most out of your music with an award-winning, emotionally charged listening experience.

See All Features Life like audio

TAKE YOUR MUSIC WITH YOU,
TO THE BEACH, THE PARK,
WHEREVER.

listen better

Award-Winning Sound

This headphone delivers premium playback with fine-tuned
 acoustics that maximize clarity, breadth, and balance. The
 comfort-cushion ear cups buffer outside noise for immersive
 sound so you can experience music the way it was meant to be
 heard.

why choose us

Experience headfone Features

[rev_slider alias="niches_19_headfone2" slidertitle="Home 31 Headfone"][/rev_slider]reviews

CUSTOMER SAY

Awesome Best Headphones EVER!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I've NEVER experienced such quality and crystal clear sound as clear as this and now saving up for the $400 Beats Pro Chrissy From Fresno, Ca Great value for the money ! Classic Beat's sound, well built, rugged, comfortable, and no battery to change. Streamlined design. Great value for the money ! Chrissy From Fresno, Ca Better than Expected My son loves it. It seems like it’s more fun for him. Maybe because of the smoother ride. It’s also way more comfortable for my husband and I. John Doe Design

Specs

Dimensions/weight

Headphones:7.1" H x 5.5" W x 2.4" D (5.7 oz)
Audio cable only:47.2"
USB cable:12"
Carrying case:5" H x 5" W x 2.3" D

Additional details

Wireless range: 30 ft (9 m)
 Battery life: Up to 15 hours
Charging time: 1.5 hours for full charge
Quick charge: 15 minutes for 2 hours play time

What's in the box

  1. Beats Pro headphones
  2. 4.2mm coiled cable with 3.5mm twist lock plug
  3. ¼" audio adapter
  4. RemoteTalk cable to control your music and take calls
  5. In-line remote & mic cable (features may vary)
  6. Carrying pouch
shop now

CHOOSE PRODUCTS​

  • Headfone Red

    $878,17 Add to cart

  • Headfone Black

    $744,11 Add to cart

  • Headfone Blue

    $139,27 Add to cart
